article_title: CVS Doubles Up Walgreen In Hospital Deals As Obamacare Pushes Collaboration

article_metadata.description: CVS Caremark (CVS) pushed further ahead of rival Walgreen (WAG) in launching today more partnerships with hospitals and health care systems as clinical affiliations become more common in the era of the Affordable Care Act. CVS/Caremark’s announcement today that it has entered into a clinical affiliation with MedStar Health, a 10 [...]
article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen
